Ritualist:StarterRelic.NAME: Book of Incantations
Ritualist:StarterRelic.FLAVOR: A tome of rites and demons.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 extra card your first and every other turn.

Ritualist:FeedingMirror.NAME: Feeding Mirror
Ritualist:FeedingMirror.FLAVOR: Feeds on its holder's energy. Produces a barrier to protect it's host.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, convert each remaining Energy into 4 Block.

Ritualist:MortalTether.NAME: Mortal Tether
Ritualist:MortalTether.FLAVOR: Keeps you grounded in this dimension. Curiously, holding it makes you lighter.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [G] and lose 10 Attunement at the start of each turn.
